channel.title: ATLAS on Tan Zhou
channel.description: Recent content in ATLAS on Tan Zhou

item.title: Photon counting LiDAR: An adaptive ground and canopy height retrieval algorithm for ICESat-2 data
item.description: Introduction: The upcoming Ice, Cloud and Land Elevation Satellite-2 (ICESat-2) mission will offer prospects for mapping and monitoring biomass and carbon of terrestrial ecosystems over large areas using photon counting LiDAR data Goal: We aim to develop a methodology to derive terrain elevation and vegetation canopy height from testbed sensor data and further pre-validate the capacity of the mission to meet its science objectives for the ecosystem community. Methods: We investigated a novel methodological framework with two essential steps for characterizing terrain and canopy height using Multiple Altimeter Beam Experimental LiDAR (MABEL) data and simulated ICESat-2 data with various vegetation conditions.
